description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED HIP TO GABLE ROOF CONVERSION, ERECTION OF A REAR DORMER WITH JULIETTE BALCONY, INSERTION OF 3X ROOFLIGHTS ON FRONT ROOFSLOPE AND INSERTION OF A JULIETTE BALCONY ON THE FIRST FLOOR REAR ELEVATION.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations would consist of the alteration of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - INFORMATIVE 
This approval confers permission under the Town and Country Planning Acts only. It does not confer consent or approval under any other statutory enactment; including the Building Regulations. Failure to obtain all necessary consents may result in enforcement action.
